A class for storing TeddyBear specific information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TeddyBear​(java.lang.String description)
    Constructor Passes final static product name to parent class, increments the count of TOTAL_TEDDY_BEAR_MADE class variable, assigns the passed description to this teddy bear object and assigns the price to be 0.0; which means it's free by default.
    TeddyBear​(java.lang.String description, double price)
    Constructor Passes final static product name to parent class, increments the count of TOTAL_TEDDY_BEAR_MADE class variable and assigns the passed description and price to this teddy bear object.
